00001                         /* Sparse triangular matrices in triplet format */
00002 #include "dtTMatrix.h"
00003 #include "dgTMatrix.h" /* xTMatrix_validate */
00004 
00005 /* This should be use for *BOTH* triangular and symmetric Tsparse: */
00006 SEXP tTMatrix_validate(SEXP x)
00007 {
00008     SEXP val = xTMatrix_validate(x);/* checks x slot */
00009     if(isString(val))
00010         return(val);
00011     else {
00012         SEXP
00013             islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym),
00014             jslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym);
00015         int uploT = (*uplo_P(x) == 'U'),
00016             k, nnz = length(islot),
00017             *xj = INTEGER(jslot),
00018             *xi = INTEGER(islot);
00019 
00020         /* Maybe FIXME: ">" should be ">="      for diag = 'U' (uplo = 'U') */
00021         if(uploT) {
00022             for (k = 0; k < nnz; k++)
00023                 if(xi[k] > xj[k])
00024                     return mkString(_("uplo='U' must not have sparse entries in lower diagonal"));
00025         }
00026         else {
00027             for (k = 0; k < nnz; k++)
00028                 if(xi[k] < xj[k])
00029                     return mkString(_("uplo='L' must not have sparse entries in upper diagonal"));
00030         }
00031 
00032         return ScalarLogical(1);
00033     }
00034 }

00038 /* Should generalize this, also for ltT -> lgC --
00039  * along the lines in ./TMatrix_as.c  ..... or drop completely : */
00040 SEXP dtTMatrix_as_dgCMatrix(SEXP x)
00041 {
00042     CHM_TR tx = AS_CHM_TR(x);
00043     CHM_SP cx = cholmod_triplet_to_sparse(tx, tx->nzmax, &c);
00044     R_CheckStack();
00045 
00046  /* FIXME
00047  * int Rkind = (tx->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00048  */
00049     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cx, 1/*do_free*/, 0, /*Rkind*/ 0, "",
00050                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00051 }
